00018 FirstCompleteAPGenerator::FirstCompleteAPGenerator(TAPGeneratorOptions* opts):
00019   TVAnalysedPulseGenerator("FirstComplete",opts),
00020   fMaxBinAmplitude(SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(GetChannel()), 
00021                    TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str()))),
00022   fConstantFractionTime(SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(GetChannel()), 
00023                         TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str())),
00024                         std::pow(2, TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str()))) - 1,
00025                         TSetupData::Instance()->GetClockTick(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str())),
00026                         opts->GetDouble("time_shift", TSetupData::Instance()->GetTimeShift(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str()))),
00027                         opts->GetDouble("constant_fraction", -0.10)), 
00028   fSimpleIntegral(SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetPedestal(GetChannel()), 
00029                   TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(TSetupData::Instance()->GetBankName(GetChannel().str()))),
00030   fPulseCandidateFinder(new PulseCandidateFinder(GetChannel().str(), opts)) {
00031 
00032         // Do things to set up the generator here. 
00033 }

00035 FirstCompleteAPGenerator::~FirstCompleteAPGenerator(){
00036     // delete all sub-pulses
00037     for(PulseIslandList::iterator i_tpi=fSubPulses.begin(); i_tpi!=fSubPulses.end(); ++i_tpi){ 
00038         delete *i_tpi;
00039     }
00040 }
00041 
00042 int FirstCompleteAPGenerator::ProcessPulses( 
00043         const PulseIslandList& pulseList,
00044         AnalysedPulseList& analysedList){
00045 
00046     // The variables that this generator will be filling
00047     double amplitude, time, integral;
00048 
00049     TAnalysedPulse* tap;
00050     // Loop over all the TPIs given to us
00051     for (PulseIslandList::const_iterator original_tpi=pulseList.begin();
00052             original_tpi!=pulseList.end(); original_tpi++){
00053 
00054       // Look for more than one pulse on the TPI
00055         fPulseCandidateFinder->FindPulseCandidates(*original_tpi);
00056         int n_pulse_candidates = fPulseCandidateFinder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00057         fPulseCandidateFinder->GetPulseCandidates(fSubPulses);
00058 
00059         if (Debug() && n_pulse_candidates > 0
00060             && (GetChannel().str() == "ScL")
00061            ) {
00062           
00063           std::cout << "FirstCompleteAPGenerator: " << GetChannel().str() 
00064                     << ": n_pulse_candidates = " << n_pulse_candidates  << std::endl;
00065 
00066             DrawPulse(original_tpi-pulseList.begin(),
00067                     (*original_tpi)->GetTimeStamp(),
00068                     (*original_tpi)->GetPulseLength());
00069         }
00070 
00071         for(PulseIslandList::const_iterator i_tpi=fSubPulses.begin(); i_tpi!=fSubPulses.end(); ++i_tpi){
00072             // Skip small pulses.  This must be at least 1 to skip empty pulses
00073           //            PulseIslandList::const_iterator i_tpi=original_tpi;
00074             if((*i_tpi)->GetPulseLength() < 14) continue;
00075 
00076             // Analyse each TPI
00077             amplitude=fMaxBinAmplitude(*i_tpi);
00078             time=fConstantFractionTime(*i_tpi);
00079             integral=fSimpleIntegral(*i_tpi);
00080 
00081             // Now that we've found the information we were looking for make a TAP to
00082             // hold it.  This method makes a TAP and sets the parent TPI info.  It needs
00083             // the index of the parent TPI in the container as an argument
00084             tap = MakeNewTAP(original_tpi-pulseList.begin());
00085             tap->SetAmplitude(amplitude);
00086             tap->SetTime(time);
00087             tap->SetIntegral(integral);
00088 
00089             // Finally add the new TAP to the output list
00090             analysedList.push_back(tap);
00091 
00092         } // loop over all sub-pulses
00093 
00094 
00095     } // loop over all original TPIs
00096 
00097     return 0;
00098 }
00099 
00100 void FirstCompleteAPGenerator::DrawPulse(int original, int pulse_timestamp, int n_pulse_samples){
00101 
00102   /*    if( ExportPulse::Instance())
00103         ExportPulse::Instance()->AddToExportList(GetChannel().str(), original);
00104     else return;
00105   */
00106     for (std::vector<TPulseIsland*>::const_iterator subPulseIter = fSubPulses.begin();
00107             subPulseIter != fSubPulses.end(); ++subPulseIter) {
00108         std::stringstream histname;
00109         histname << "hSubPulse_" << GetChannel() << "_Event" 
00110             << EventNavigator::Instance().EntryNo() <<"_Pulse" << original
00111             << "_SubPulse" << subPulseIter - fSubPulses.begin();
00112 
00113         const std::vector<int>& sub_pulse_samples = (*subPulseIter)->GetSamples();
00114 
00115         TH1D* hPulse = new TH1D(modules::parser::ToCppValid(histname.str()).c_str(),
00116                 histname.str().c_str(), n_pulse_samples,0,n_pulse_samples);
00117         hPulse->SetLineColor(kMagenta);
00118 
00119         int delay = (*subPulseIter)->GetTimeStamp() - pulse_timestamp;
00120         for (std::vector<int>::const_iterator subPulseSampleIter = sub_pulse_samples.begin();
00121                 subPulseSampleIter != sub_pulse_samples.end(); ++subPulseSampleIter) {
00122             hPulse->Fill( (subPulseSampleIter - sub_pulse_samples.begin()) + delay, (*subPulseSampleIter) );
00123         }
00124     }
00125 }
